item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

1/24/2011's location will be:
Kelly's

Kelly's is an Irish pubs in the area, located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments. There is of course the Irish wood work at the bar, a nice fireplace decor in the dinning room, and when the weather does permit (obviously not recently.) you could get a table on the patio. The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites and more common American fare.

Please RSVP for this event as soon as you know so that I can give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

The manager Patrick has generously offered to put some free nibbles out in the bar area.

Drink Specials will be $1 off Draughts, with a few others (TBD) getting special $2 and $3 off.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

...
item.name: Happy Hour - Kelly's
